controller

类 ReversiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ReversiController

  • public class ReversiController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller of the Reversi game which has the following purpose: 1. check the placeable locations on the board. 2. flip the tokens. 3. get the scores.
    作者:
    Jerry Zhu

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversiController(model.ReversiModel model)
      This is the constructor of the controller which initialize a model.

      This method will flip the tokens according to the player's side("W" or "B").

      This method is to get the placeable positions according to the player.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReversiController

        public ReversiController(model.ReversiModel model)
        This is the constructor of the controller which initialize a model.
        参数:
        model - The recent table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPlaceableLocations

        public java.util.HashSet<model.Point> getPlaceableLocations(java.lang.String player,
                                                            java.lang.String opponent,
                                                            java.util.HashSet<model.Point> placeablePositions,
                                                            model.ReversiModel model)
        This method is to get the placeable positions according to the player.
        参数:
        player - The player we need to find it's placeable locations
        opponent - The player's opponent
        placeablePositions - A hashset that collect all of the placeable positions
        model - The current table of the game
        返回:
        The hashset that contains all of the placeable positions

      • flipTheOpponent

        public java.lang.String[][] flipTheOpponent(model.Point point,
                                            java.lang.String player,
                                            java.lang.String opponent,
                                            java.lang.String[][] table)
        This method will flip the tokens according to the player's side("W" or "B").
        参数:
        point - The point that recently placed on the board.
        player - The recent point's side.
        opponent - The opponent side of the recent point.
        table - The recent board of the game.
        返回:
        The new table with the token flip.

      • tableEquals

        public boolean tableEquals(java.lang.String[][] table1,
                           java.lang.String[][] table2)
